Rachel Maddow now has a scary firsthand experience with COVID-19, and after seeing her longtime partner fight for her life for weeks ... she's warning Americans to take the virus more seriously.

articles.title: Michael J Fox quit alcohol two years after Parkinson's diagnosis - Daily Mail
articles.description: The Back To The Future star, 59, said his first reaction to his diagnosis in 1991 at the age of 29 was to 'double up on his drinking'.
articles.content:
